# english-auction
A rough draft, english auction contract
## Compile contracts
```
cd english-auction
ls -la
solc --bin english_auction.sol
```

![Alt Text](https://media.giphy.com/media/tXhBA26kiVzy4FvqFW/giphy.gif)



## Quick start

``` 
git clone https://github.com/timxor/english-auction.git 

tim@Timmys-MacBook-Pro-13-inch-2062 english-auction % pwd
/Users/tim/localDev/english-auction

tim@Timmys-MacBook-Pro-13-inch-2062 english-auction % ls
LICENSE                 README.md               english_auction.sol

tim@Timmys-MacBook-Pro-13-inch-2062 english-auction % solc --bin english_auction.sol

======= english_auction.sol:EnglishAuction =======
Binary:
608060405234801561001057600080fd5b506040516108ea3803806108ea833981810160405281019061003291
906100cb565b80600160006101000a81548173ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff021916908373
ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff160217905550814261007f919061011a565b600c8190555082
600c54610093919061011a565b600e81905550505050610209565b6000815190506100b0816101db565b929150
50565b6000815190506100c5816101f2565b92915050565b6000806000606084860312156100e057600080fd5b
60006100ee868287016100b6565b93505060206100ff868287016100b6565b9250506040610110868287016100


tim@Timmys-MacBook-Pro-13-inch-2062 english-auction % say "now that is some swanky binary output"

tim@Timmys-MacBook-Pro-13-inch-2062 english-auction % 

```

## todo

- selling more than one item 
  - multiple different items
  - multiple identical items
    




#### notes

from

https://www.notion.so/Burnt-Finance-79189384db454409864a8fb48141339f#9bef4185112e4f7a9159eac1cb91d072

```
function closeAuction() public {

    // todo
    // 4. At the conclusion of the auction, if the reserve price is hit,
    // if (standingBidAmount > reservePrice)

    // the item is transferred to the winner.
    // winner = potentialBuyerAddress;
    // transfer(winner, asset)

    // The highest bid amount is transferred to the buyer.
    // transfer(seller, highestBidAmount)

    // If the reserve isnâ€™t hit, the money and asset are returned to the respective parties.
    // transfer(seller, asset)
    // transfer(highestBidder, highestBidAmount)
}
```
